N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 386.1 - Staff

State Regulations

Each agency shall: (a) provide a staff development program for
all levels of social services staff or make arrangements with other agencies, with this department, or with educational facilities for the provision of such
training. Such training activity should be initiated simultaneously with the
classification of cases to assist staff with the proper identification of
problems and to prepare case workers to provide the necessary
services; (b) provide for the
selection of workers, case supervisors and consultants best qualified by
education and experience for work in relation to the defined problems of
families and adults and shall secure, as available, professionally qualified
supervisors, consultants and workers to provide preventive and rehabilitative
services in relation to serious problems of families and adults. Notes
